title: ðŸš¨Falcons fire coach Dan Quinn and GM Thomas Dimitroff - Emergency Podcast (Football 10/12)
description:
Dan Quinn's time has run out in Atlanta. After 5-plus seasons, the worst blown lead in Super Bowl history (and other notables collapses) along the way, the Falcons have parted ways with their head coach. The organization has also fired GM Thomas Dimitroff after an 0-5 start to the 2020 season. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down the decision, the timing of it and what's next for the tortured franchise.Â

Dan Quinn's time has run out in Atlanta. After 5-plus seasons, the worst blown lead in Super Bowl history (and other notables collapses) along the way, the Falcons have parted ways with their head coach. The organization has also fired GM Thomas Dimitroff after an 0-5 start to the 2020 season. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down the decision, the timing of it and what's next for the tortured franchise.Â
